name: Crumbly Dungeon
description:
CRUMBLY DUNGEON

Crumbly Dungeon is a short card-game with fast paced gameplay and some roguelike elements. The game was made and submitted for the 20 Second Game Jam. 

You have 20 seconds before the roof of the dungeon collapses on your head! You receive a deck of randomized cards to aid your escape against the monsters of the dungeon. CHECK OUT MY GAMES SOCIALS
